hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: No Hidden Fees. No Long-Term Contracts.
hero.description: Choose the AI automation package that fits your business. All plans include setup, training, and ongoing support.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: Perfect for small businesses getting started with AI

plans.name: Professional
plans.description: Most popular for growing LA businesses

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For established businesses with complex needs

addOns.title: Add-On Services
addOns.subtitle: Enhance any plan with additional features

items.name: Additional Voice Agent
items.description: Extra phone number and voice agent for multiple departments

items.name: Custom Integration
items.description: Connect to any app or system not in our standard library

items.name: Advanced Analytics
items.description: Detailed performance insights and custom reporting

items.name: Priority Support
items.description: 1-hour response time and dedicated support line

items.question: Is there a setup fee?
items.answer: No! Setup, training, and deployment are included free with all plans.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, all plans are month-to-month with no long-term contracts. Cancel with 30 days notice.

items.question: What happens if I exceed my interaction limit?
items.answer: We'll notify you before you reach your limit. Additional interactions are $0.10 each, or you can upgrade your plan.

items.question: Do you offer custom solutions?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our Enterprise plan includes custom development for unique business requirements.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Most implementations are complete within 2-3 weeks, depending on complexity and integration requirements.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Start with a free consultation to find the perfect plan
